label.en-US: Use static metadata Identifier / Event ID

name: robot speed
info:
Send a number to set the speed of the robot (0-100).
Send anything else to get the current speed.

name: robot version switch
info:
Routes a message based on robot RobWare version.

Intended to be used to implement different implementations for RW6 (webservices v1) and RW7 (webservices v2).

Uses msg.payload_

name: robot start/stop
info:
Send 1 or true to start the robot execution.
Send 0 or false to stop the robot execution.
Send anything else to check the execution state:
- 1 is running.
- 0 is stopped.

name: motoroff
outputLabels: The robot is in a standby state where there is no power to the robot's motors. The state has to be shifted to motors on before the robot can move.
info:
